oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RPPC Sevierville
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ID by seller as ‘Ella Ellen Posed Donkey, Sevierville, Tennessee, Itinerant Photographer.' 1911. To Mrs. G.W. Farthington(?), postmarked Jan. 3, 1911. One cent stamp. RPPC (Real photo postcard). 1 pc.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Children; Portraits; Donkeys;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On back: Severvill Dear Mother and family hope youare all well and had a happy Xmas We have since been well will write you a letter soon with lots of love from all to all Ella & Ellen. Addressed to: Mrs. G.W. Farthington(?) Butler, Okla. c/o Com. Hotel Postmarked Jan. 3, 1911.
